Uses of Package
card

Packages that use card
Package
Description
card
Provides all the objects that interact directly with a card and the card class itself.
casino
Provides all the objects that are directly and can be (more or less) tangible things that are inside a casino, that being the player and a round of the poker game that is being played
type
Provides the types of games that can be played, in this case, there are 2 implemented game types those being the simulation and debug mode Package open for extension
variants
Provides the game variants of video poker, along side with a HandEvalutor that can analyse the different type of hands (complete or incomplete) Package open for extension
  • Classes in card used by card
    Class
    Description
    Card
    Represents a Deck card with its respective rank and suit
    Hand
    Represents the cards on the player's hand, with each hand being an array of cards
  • Classes in card used by casino
    Class
    Description
    Card
    Represents a Deck card with its respective rank and suit
    Deck
    Represents a normal Deck of Cards either loaded by the user or automatically generated (with 52 cards) This class contains an Array of Cards;
    Hand
    Represents the cards on the player's hand, with each hand being an array of cards
  • Classes in card used by type
    Class
    Description
    Card
    Represents a Deck card with its respective rank and suit
  • Classes in card used by variants

    Description
    Hand
    Represents the cards on the player's hand, with each hand being an array of cards
